mapper.select: SELECT pi.PRIVATE_INQUIRY_UID, pi.USER_UID, ic.CATEGORY_NAME, pi.TITLE, pi.CONTENT, pi.CREATE_DATE FROM PRIVATE_INQUIRIES pi LEFT JOIN INQUIRY_CATEGORIES ic ON pi.INQUIRY_CATEGORY_UID = ic.INQUIRY_CATEGORY_UID LEFT JOIN PRIVATE_INQUIRY_ANSWERS pia ON pi.PRIVATE_INQUIRY_UID = pia.PRIVATE_INQUIRY_UID WHERE pia.PRIVATE_INQUIRY_ANSWER_UID IS NULL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRIVATE_INQUIRY_ANSWERS (PRIVATE_INQUIRY_ANSWER_UID, PRIVATE_INQUIRY_UID, ADMIN_UID, CONTENT, CREATE_DATE) VALUES (#{PRIVATE_INQUIRY_ANSWER_UID},#{PRIVATE_INQUIRY_UID},#{ADMIN_UID},#{CONTENT},sysdate())
